step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap Add Layer, then tap Empty Layer.=Tap Add Layer, then tap Empty Layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Choose the Marquee Selection tool from the toolbox.=Choose the Marquee Selection tool from the toolbox.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Corners and enter a radius of 15px.=Tap Corners and enter a radius of 15px.
$$$/Tutorial/Starting from the top left corner, create a selection for the inside of your frame.=Starting from the top left corner, create a selection for the inside of your frame.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To adjust the position of your selection, press and hold your finger to the screen. Move the selection while your finger is still pressed.=To adjust the position of your selection, press and hold your finger to the screen. Move the selection while your finger is still pressed.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Choose Select > Inverse to select only the frame area.=Choose Select > Inverse to select only the frame area.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap the & menu and choose Fill & Stroke.=Tap the & menu and choose Fill & Stroke.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Color. Select black as the color and tap Apply.=Tap Color. Select black as the color and tap Apply.

$$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Artistic > Scratches. Use a white Scratch color, set Type as Metal, and tap Apply.=Choose Effects > Artistic > Scratches. Use a white Scratch color, set Type as Metal, and tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Basic > Bevel. Adjust the Angle and other values and tap Apply.=Choose Effects > Basic > Bevel. Adjust the Angle and other values and tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Basic > Drop Shadow. Adjust the Angle and other values and tap Apply.=Choose Effects > Basic > Drop Shadow. Adjust the Angle and other values and tap Apply.
